blocks.value: The Dominions, also called Lordships, are angels who regulate the duties of all lower angels. They ensure that the cosmos remains in order and that God's commands are carried out.
Dominions possess a form of divine authority and are rarely seen by mortals. They manifest the majesty of God and govern the activities of all angelic groups beneath them.
Through the Dominions, God's sovereignty is made known. They receive their orders directly from the Seraphim and Cherubim, then delegate responsibilities to the lower choirs of angels.
